scripts.build: npm run contracts:build && npm run website:build
scripts.clean: npm run contracts:solo:down && rm -rf data/* contracts/deployments/vechain_solo
scripts.dev:testnet: npm run contracts:deploy:testnet && npm run website:start
scripts.dev: npm run contracts:solo:up && npm run contracts:deploy:solo && npm run website:start
scripts.install:all: npm run contracts:install && npm run website:install
